text: dangnan rea cung wa hi kæ khea hı tx reux phay tı kar khumkhrxng khxng rea læa kha sangsxn khxng rea læa meux kha baycha khxng rea di ma thung na nı tea k ca deuxd phung cea cng brrthuk thuk chnid khxng satw pen khu «læa khrxbkhraw khxng cea dwy nxkcak phu thi kha daras di banthuk wi kxn læw (hı hayna) nı hmu phwk khea (thi mi yxm sraththa) læa cea xya di khx chwyhelux khea nı brrda phu thi xthrrm thæcring phwk khea ca thuk hı cm natay
